extension.description: A whole dev team of AI agents in your editor.
extension.description.onprem: On-premises edition of Roo Code for enterprise environments. Features local LLM support, telemetry blocking, and complete offline functionality.

settings.vsCodeLmModelSelector.descripti: Settings for VSCode Language Model API
settings.vsCodeLmModelSelector.vendor.de: The vendor of the language model (e.g. copilot)
settings.vsCodeLmModelSelector.family.de: The family of the language model (e.g. gpt-4)
settings.customStoragePath.description: Custom storage path. Leave empty to use the default location. Supports absolute paths (e.g. 'D:\RooCodeStorage')
settings.autoImportSettingsPath.descript: Path to a RooCode configuration file to automatically import on extension startup. Supports absolute paths and paths relative to the home directory (e.g. '~/Documents/roo-code-settings.json'). Leave empty to disable auto-import.
settings.localLLM.type.description: Type of local LLM provider to use for on-premises deployment
settings.localLLM.vllm.modelName.descrip: Model name to use with vLLM (e.g., microsoft/DialoGPT-medium)
settings.localLLM.vllm.apiKey.descriptio: API key for vLLM authentication (if required)
settings.localLLM.ollama.modelName.descr: Model name to use with Ollama (e.g., llama2, codellama)
settings.localLLM.enabled.description: Enable local LLM for on-premises operation
settings.localLLM.fallbackToCloud.descri: Fallback to cloud LLM when local LLM is unavailable
settings.localLLM.model.description: Model name to use with local LLM provider
settings.localLLM.maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens for local LLM responses
settings.localLLM.temperature.descriptio: Temperature setting for local LLM (0.0 to 1.0)
settings.localLLM.timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for local LLM requests
settings.localLLM.apiKey.description: API key for local LLM authentication (if required)
settings.localLLM.description: Configuration for local LLM providers used in on-premises environments
